Verses: 1 pinbu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Anniya Dhevargalai Madhiththu, Dhraatcharasamulla Paaththirangalai Virumbugiravargalaana Isravel Puththirarperil Karththar Vaiththirukkira Anbukku Oppaaga Nee Innum Poi, Than Nesaraal Nesikkappattavalum, Vibasaariyumaana Oru Sthreeyai Serththukkol Endru Sonnaar.
2 appozhudhu Naan Avalai Enakkup Padhinaindhu Vellikkaasukkum, Ondraraikkalam Vaarkodhumaikkum Kondu,
3 avalai Nokki: Nee Vesiththanampannaamalum, Oruvanaiyum Seraamalum, Aneganaal Enakkaagak Kaaththiru; Unakkaaga Naanum Kaaththiruppen Endren.
4 isravel Puththirar Aneganaal Raajaa Illaamalum, Adhipadhi Illaamalum, Pali Illaamalum, Silai Illaamalum, Epodh Vasthiram Illaamalum, Theraabeem Illaamalum Iruppaargal.

5 pinbu Isravel Puththirar Thirumbi, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraiyum, Thangal Raajaavaagiya Dhaaveedhaiyum Thedi, Kadaisinaatkalil Karththaraiyum, Avarudaiya Dhayavaiyum Naadi Anjikkaiyaai Varuvaargal.
